LanguageData.AIBaseThought.description: I am unable to feel anything..
LanguageData.AIShieldingError.label: Shielding error
LanguageData.AIShieldingError.description: My shielding has holes. Activated repair nanites.
LanguageData.AIBatteriesRefilled.label: Battery full
LanguageData.AIBatteriesRefilled.description: My batteries are refilled. Back to work.
LanguageData.AILowBattery.label: Battery low
LanguageData.AILowBattery.description: My batteries are low. I need to recharge them soon.
LanguageData.AILowCriticalBattery.label: Battery critical
LanguageData.AILowCriticalBattery.description: My batteries are really low. If they fail, I'll initiate my self destruct protocol.
